entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 07:00 AM MST Monday 16 May 2016
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers later this afternoon. Local smoke. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 26. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 May 2016
